title: Charge in style with 20 percent off the Twelve South HiRise 3 Apple stand
content:
Macworld

Black Friday seems to be the perfect time to make your desk a lot more organized and free of the gazillion cables you use to charge your iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods. The Twelve South HiRise 3 Deluxe is a gorgeous charging station that can handle all three devices at once for just $120, a solid 20 percent under its $150 MSRP.

This charging station has a clean look with a vertical functional design that has a 7.5W wireless base in the back for your earbuds, a 5W foldable magnetic charger for the Apple Watch, and a 15W MagSafe charger stand that works with Standby Mode. That AirPod charger can even act as a wireless base for a second phone, as long as you don’t mind the lower charging speed.

This vertical design takes up minimal desk space, making for a better way to organize your space. Plus, it gives you a designated space to place your earbuds and Apple Watch while you’re not using them. Whether on a desk or nightstand, the vertical stand for your phone is even more useful because it allows you to tilt the phone to the right angle so you can see what’s on the screen.

So go ahead and get the Twelve South HirRise 3 Deluxe charging station for your Apple gear for just $120 this Black Friday.

This Twelve South 3-in-1 charger is 20% off
